channel.title: Talks on myarik
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on myarik

item.title: The effective use of Django ORM
item.description: This talk describes how to use Django ORM effectively. Main topics: - Django ORM Mistakes - Performance Problems in the Django ORM - Database concurrency in Django the right way Slides: SlideShare

item.title: How to integrate Django REST Framework and Elasticsearch
item.description: This talk describes how to use the library django-rest-elasticsearch for integrating Elasticsearch with Django. Slides: SlideShare
